title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: The Shawshank Redemption is a 1994 American prison drama film about banker Andy Dufresne (Tim Robbins), who is wrongly convicted of murdering his wife and her lover and sentenced to life in the Shawshank Penitentiary

title: The Godfather
description: There are two prominent movies titled The Good Father, one is the 2021 Lifetime movie The Good Father: The Martin MacNeill Story, a true-crime drama about a doctor who may have murdered his wife and brought his mistress to live as the nanny. The other is the 1985 British film The Good Father, a social drama starring Anthony Hopkins about a bitter divorced man who channels his rage into helping a friend win a custody battle

title: Schindler's List
description: Schindler's List is a historical drama film about Oskar Schindler, a German industrialist who used his enamelware factory during World War II to save over 1,100 Polish-Jewish refugees from the Holocaust

title: The Godfather Part II
description: The Avengers assemble once more to reverse the devastation caused by Thanos and restore balance to the universe.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
description: Jake Sully and Ney'tiri protect their family as new threats emerge in Pandora's breathtaking aquatic worlds.

title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
description: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home in the wake of King T'Challa's death, facing new challenges.

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: Doctor Strange teams up with Scarlet Witch to confront a threat from the multiverse that could destroy reality.

title: Thor: Love and Thunder
description: Thor embarks on a journey of self-discovery, facing the deadly Gorr the God Butcher and unexpected allies.

title: Eternals
description: Immortal beings known as Eternals reunite after thousands of years to fight against the Deviants.

title: Dune
description: Paul Atreides must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family.
